customCommands.name: explain
customCommands.prompt:
Explain the following code in detail, including its purpose, how it works, and any important patterns or conventions:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: refactor
customCommands.prompt:
Refactor the following code to improve readability, performance, and maintainability while preserving functionality:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: optimize
customCommands.prompt:
Analyze and optimize the following code for better performance, considering time complexity, space complexity, and best practices:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: test
customCommands.prompt:
Generate comprehensive unit tests for the following code, covering edge cases and common scenarios:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: document
customCommands.prompt:
Add comprehensive documentation to the following code, including JSDoc/docstrings, inline comments for complex logic, and usage examples:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: debug
customCommands.prompt:
Analyze the following code for potential bugs, errors, or issues. Suggest fixes and explain the problems:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: security
customCommands.prompt:
Perform a security audit on the following code. Identify vulnerabilities, security risks, and suggest improvements:

{{{ input }}}

customCommands.name: pattern
customCommands.prompt:
Analyze the following code and identify design patterns, architectural patterns, and coding patterns being used. Suggest improvements:

{{{ input }}}

slashCommands.name: edit
slashCommands.description: Edit code in place with AI assistance

slashCommands.name: comment
slashCommands.description: Add comments and documentation to code
